142.customerMessage1: Is the size 31 going to fit 12-14 ? Or is the size  31 a size 10-12?
142.AgentMessage1: Pink Lily: Based on our size chart, a size 31 waist aligns with a size L (10-12), not a 12-14. If you're typically between 12 and 14 or prefer a more relaxed fit, we'd recommend sizing up to an XL, which fits waists 33-34. You can take a look at our size chart here: https://pinklily.attn.tv/aFYL-dXEG2NG Feel free to reach out if you have any further questions!
142.customerMessage2: So the Melody Leopard cropped flare Jeans don't come in a 33-34 ( XL) ?

As an SMS subscriber, you'll also be among the first to know of our awesome updates! In the meantime, check out other animal print pants here: https://pinklily.attn.tv/a4zR4SJw9qZB
